short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Play the original Super Mario Bros game online for Chrome! Have Fun!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Super Mario Bros is a beloved and iconic platform game now available as a Chrome extension. Join Mario on his epic adventure to rescue Princess Peach from the clutches of the evil Bowser. Traverse through vibrant worlds, overcome obstacles, and defeat enemies along the way. Jump on platforms, collect power-ups, and explore hidden secrets. With its charming graphics, catchy music, and addictive gameplay, Super Mario Bros provides a nostalgic and immersive experience. Navigate through challenging levels, face off against memorable bosses, and save the Mushroom Kingdom. Whether you're a longtime fan or new to the game, Super Mario Bros on Chrome Extension offers hours of fun and classic gaming. Get ready to embark on a timeless adventure with Mario and friends.

*Note: We have added "Clasroom 6x, Poki Unblocked" button, making it easy for players to quickly access the games on our website https://classroom-6x.org, https://poki.ee/
